desc: The Calmer is a rechargeable device used to distract the brain from discomfort that occurs when the heart is rapidly and/or irregularly beating, or in AFiB. This is accomplished in a manner similar to that used by Eastern medicine therapists who use acupressure to massage specific areas to be treated.

layout.text: A DEVICE TO CALM AND SOOTHE
Bring calm to your hectic life using ancient Easten medicine
